body:
Closes #4626 

The HDF Group updated their website with a new repository structure that seems to be significantly more consistent than the old one (see `url_for_version` for `hdf5` package).

Also updates `hdf` to `AutotoolsPackage` and adds newer versions of `szip`, `hdf`, and `hdf5@1.8`.

@iulian787 @cyrush
title: Update hdfgroup packages to new URL structure
